name: Brimstone
description: Brimstone's orbital arsenal ensures his squad always has the advantage.

abilities.name: Incendiary
abilities.description: Launch an incendiary grenade that deploys a damaging field of fire.

abilities.name: Sky Smoke
abilities.description: Deploy a tactical map to call in orbital smoke drops.

abilities.name: Stim Beacon
abilities.description: Target a nearby location to call in a stim beacon, giving players RapidFire.

abilities.name: Orbital Strike
abilities.description: Use a tactical map to target an orbital strike, creating a damaging zone.

name: Phoenix
description: Phoenix's star power shines through in his fighting style, igniting the battlefield with flash and flare.

abilities.name: Curveball
abilities.description: Cast a curved flare that blinds any player who looks at it.

abilities.name: Hot Hands
abilities.description: Throw a fireball that explodes after a delay or upon impact with the ground.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: Cast a flame wall that blocks vision and damages players passing through it.

abilities.name: Run it Back
abilities.description: Mark your current location, then become invulnerable and die to return to that location.

name: Jett
description: Representing her home country of South Korea, Jett's agile and evasive fighting style lets her take risks no one else can.

abilities.name: Updraft
abilities.description: Propels Jett high into the air.

abilities.name: Tailwind
abilities.description: Jett dashes a short distance in the direction she is moving.

abilities.name: Cloudburst
abilities.description: Throws a projectile that expands into a brief vision-blocking cloud.

abilities.name: Blade Storm
abilities.description: Equips Jett with several throwing knives that deal moderate to heavy damage.

name: Sage
description: The bastion of China, Sage creates safety for herself and her team wherever she goes.

abilities.name: Barrier Orb
abilities.description: Creates a solid wall that blocks movement and gunfire.

abilities.name: Slow Orb
abilities.description: Creates a slowing field that damages and slows enemies who walk on it.

abilities.name: Healing Orb
abilities.description: Heals an ally or herself over time.

abilities.name: Resurrection
abilities.description: Revives a dead ally with full health.

name: Killjoy
description: The genius of Germany, Killjoy secures the battlefield with ease using her arsenal of inventions.

abilities.name: Alarmbot
abilities.description: Deploy a bot that hunts down enemies that get in range.

abilities.name: Turret
abilities.description: Deploy a turret that fires at enemies in a 180-degree cone.

abilities.name: Nanoswarm
abilities.description: Throw a grenade that goes covert when it lands.

abilities.name: Lockdown
abilities.description: Deploy a device that detains all enemies caught in the radius.

name: Skye
description: Hailing from Australia, Skye and her band of beasts trail-blaze the way through hostile territory.

abilities.name: Trailblazer
abilities.description: Control a Tasmanian tiger that can leap forward and explode in a concussive blast.

abilities.name: Guiding Light
abilities.description: Control a hawk that transforms into a flash when you release it.

abilities.name: Regrowth
abilities.description: Channel to heal allies in range and line of sight.

abilities.name: Seekers
abilities.description: Equip a Seeker trinket. Fire to send out three seekers to track down the three closest enemies.

name: Sova
description: Born from the eternal winter of Russia's tundra, Sova tracks, finds, and eliminates enemies with ruthless efficiency and precision.

abilities.name: Shock Bolt
abilities.description: Fire an explosive bolt that emits a damaging pulse of static energy upon impact.

abilities.name: Recon Bolt
abilities.description: Fire a bolt that deploys a sonar emitter that tags nearby enemies, revealing them.

abilities.name: Owl Drone
abilities.description: Deploy and pilot a drone that can fire a marking dart.

abilities.name: Hunter's Fury
abilities.description: Fire up to three deadly energy blasts that spear across the entire map.

name: Viper
description: American chemist, Viper deploys an array of poisonous chemical devices to control the battlefield and cripple the enemy's vision.

abilities.name: Poison Cloud
abilities.description: Deploy a gas emitter that can be reactivated to create a poisonous smoke cloud.

abilities.name: Toxic Screen
abilities.description: Deploy a line of gas emitters that can be reactivated to create a tall wall of toxic gas.

abilities.name: Snake Bite
abilities.description: Fire a projectile that explodes into a pool of damaging acid.

abilities.name: Viper's Pit
abilities.description: Equip a chemical sprayer to spray a chemical cloud that reduces the vision range and max health of players inside it.

name: Omen
description: A phantom of a memory, Omen hunts in the shadows, teleporting across the field, blinding enemies, and obscuring their vision.

abilities.name: Paranoia
abilities.description: Fire a blinding orb that passes through walls. The orb reduces the vision range of all players it touches.

abilities.name: Dark Cover
abilities.description: Cast an orb that bursts into a sphere of shadow obscuring the vision of players.

abilities.name: Shrouded Step
abilities.description: After a delay, teleport a short distance.

abilities.name: From the Shadows
abilities.description: Select anywhere on the map to teleport and reform. When arriving, appears as a Shade.

name: Raze
description: Raze explodes out of Brazil with her big personality and big guns. With her blunt-force-trauma playstyle, she excels at flushing entrenched enemies and clearing tight spaces.

abilities.name: Blast Pack
abilities.description: Throw a satchel that sticks to surfaces. Re-use to detonate and damage enemies.

abilities.name: Paint Shells
abilities.description: Throw a grenade that deals damage and creates sub-munitions, each doing damage to anyone in range.

abilities.name: Boom Bot
abilities.description: Deploy a robot that travels in a straight line, bouncing off walls and explodes when it detects an enemy.

abilities.name: Showstopper
abilities.description: Equip a rocket launcher. Fire shoots a rocket that does massive damage on hit.

name: Chamber
description: Well-dressed and well-armed, French weapons designer Chamber expels aggressors with deadly precision.

abilities.name: Trademark
abilities.description: Place a trap that scans for enemies. When a visible enemy comes in range, the trap counts down and then destabilizes the terrain around them.

abilities.name: Headhunter
abilities.description: Equip a heavy pistol with high precision and aim down sights.

abilities.name: Rendezvous
abilities.description: Place two teleport anchors. While on the ground and in range of an anchor, reactivate to quickly teleport to the other anchor.

abilities.name: Tour De Force
abilities.description: Equip a powerful, custom sniper rifle that will kill an enemy with any direct hit. Killing an enemy creates a lingering field that slows players caught inside.

name: Reyna
description: Forged in the heart of Mexico, Reyna dominates single combat, popping off with each kill she scores.

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.description: Consume a Soul Orb to rapidly heal for a short duration.

abilities.name: Dismiss
abilities.description: Consume a Soul Orb to become intangible for a short duration.

abilities.name: Leer
abilities.description: Cast an ethereal eye that destroys after a short duration. The eye will nearsight all enemies who look at it.

abilities.name: Empress
abilities.description: Enter a frenzy, increasing firing speed, equip speed, and reload speed dramatically. Scoring a kill renews the duration.

name: Cypher
description: The Moroccan information broker, Cypher is a one-man surveillance network who keeps tabs on the enemy's every move.

abilities.name: Cyber Cage
abilities.description: Toss a cyber cage in front of you that creates a temporary zone that blocks vision and slows enemies.

abilities.name: Spycam
abilities.description: Deploy a remote camera that can fire a tracking dart at enemies.

abilities.name: Trapwire
abilities.description: Place a stealthed tripwire between two walls that restrains and reveals enemies who pass through it.

abilities.name: Neural Theft
abilities.description: Extract information from an enemy corpse, revealing the location of all remaining enemies.

name: KAY/O
description: KAY/O is a machine of war built for a single purpose: neutralizing radiants.

abilities.name: FLASH/DRIVE
abilities.description: Equip a flash grenade that blinds enemies caught in its explosion.

abilities.name: ZERO/POINT
abilities.description: Equip a suppression blade that sticks to surfaces and suppresses targets in the explosion radius.

abilities.name: FRAG/MENT
abilities.description: Equip an explosive fragment that sticks to the floor and explodes multiple times.

abilities.name: NULL/CMD
abilities.description: Instantly overload with polarized radianite energy that empowers KAY/O and causes large energy pulses to emit from his location.

name: Yoru
description: Japanese native Yoru rips holes straight through reality to infiltrate enemy lines unseen.

abilities.name: BLINDSIDE
abilities.description: Equip an echo that transforms into a flash after it bounces off a surface.

abilities.name: GATECRASH
abilities.description: Equip a rift tether. Fire to send the tether forward. Alt-fire to place a tether in place.

abilities.name: FAKEOUT
abilities.description: Equip an echo that transforms into a copy of Yoru when activated. Activate to have the copy run forward.

abilities.name: DIMENSIONAL DRIFT
abilities.description: Equip a mask that can see between dimensions. Fire to enter Yoru's dimension and not be affected or seen by enemies.

name: Fade
description: Turkish bounty hunter Fade unleashes the power of raw nightmare to seize enemy secrets.

abilities.name: Seize
abilities.description: Equip a knot of raw fear that can be thrown. The knot drops down after a set time, holding nearby enemies in place.

abilities.name: Haunt
abilities.description: Equip a nightmarish entity that reveals enemies in its line of sight and can be thrown like a grenade.

abilities.name: Prowler
abilities.description: Equip a prowler that can be sent forward to hunt down enemies, nearsighting them if it reaches them.

abilities.name: Nightfall
abilities.description: Equip the power of nightmare itself, firing a wave of darkness that creates a zone that obscures vision.

name: Neon
description: Filipino Agent Neon surges forward at shocking speeds, discharging bursts of bioelectric radiance as fast as her body generates it.

abilities.name: Fast Lane
abilities.description: Fire two energy lines forward on the ground that extend a short distance or until they hit a surface.

abilities.name: Relay Bolt
abilities.description: Instantly throw an energy bolt that bounces once, electrifying the ground below with a concussive blast.

abilities.name: High Gear
abilities.description: Channel Neon's power for increased speed. When charged, Alt Fire to trigger an electric slide.

abilities.name: Overdrive
abilities.description: Unleash Neon's full power and speed for a short duration. Fire to channel the power into a deadly lightning beam.

name: Harbor
description: Hailing from India's coast, Harbor uses ancient technology to manipulate water as a shield and weapon.

abilities.name: Cove
abilities.description: Equip a sphere of shielding water that can be thrown and deployed as a protective barrier.

abilities.name: Cascade
abilities.description: Equip a wave of water that can be sent forward, creating a wall that slows enemies that pass through it.

abilities.name: High Tide
abilities.description: Equip a wall of water that can be placed to block vision and slow enemies.

abilities.name: Reckoning
abilities.description: Summon a geyser pool on the ground, periodically concussing players in its area.

name: Gekko
description: Los Angeles native Gekko leads a tight-knit crew of calamitous creatures.

abilities.name: Wingman
abilities.description: Equip a friendly creature companion that can seek out enemies and detain them.

abilities.name: Dizzy
abilities.description: Equip a plasma blast that can blind enemies. Fire to throw the blast, activating a charged plasma explosion.

abilities.name: Mosh Pit
abilities.description: Equip a chaotic plasma orb that bounces and explodes, leaving a lingering damage effect.

abilities.name: Thrash
abilities.description: Equip a nano-infused creature that can be sent forward to scout and explode on enemies.

name: Deadlock
description: Norwegian operative Deadlock deploys an array of cutting-edge nanowire to secure the battlefield from even the most lethal assault.

abilities.name: GravNet
abilities.description: Equip a GravNet grenade that slows and grounds enemies caught in its field.

abilities.name: Sonic Sensor
abilities.description: Deploy a sensor that alerts you to approaching enemies with an audio cue.

abilities.name: Barrier Mesh
abilities.description: Deploy a nanowire barrier that blocks bullets and can be activated to create a barrier wall.

abilities.name: Annihilation
abilities.description: Release a surge of nanowires that captures the first enemy it contacts, pulling them toward you.

name: Iso
description: Chinese fixer Iso channels his essence to separate himself from the pack while breaking timelines apart.

abilities.name: Double Tap
abilities.description: Equip a charged shot that fires bullet projectiles after a delay, piercing through multiple enemies.

abilities.name: Kill Contract
abilities.description: Deploy a bounty contract that tracks enemies in its zone, marking them for your team.

abilities.name: Contingency
abilities.description: Create a temporal bubble where your health can't drop below 1 for a short duration.

abilities.name: Deadline
abilities.description: Enter a focus state where time slows down for everyone but Iso, allowing for precision shots.

name: Clove
description: Irish operative Clove brings a mix of healing and tactical smoke to control the battlefield.

abilities.name: Pick-Me-Up
abilities.description: Equip a stimulating concoction that heals yourself or allies over time.

abilities.name: Meddle
abilities.description: Deploy a smoke sphere that blocks vision and applies a vulnerable effect to enemies inside.

abilities.name: Not Dead Yet
abilities.description: When downed, activate to temporarily revive yourself with partial health to fight back.

abilities.name: Ruse
abilities.description: Unleash multiple smoke orbs that reduce vision and disorient enemies caught inside.

name: Breach
description: The bionic Swede Breach fires powerful, targeted kinetic blasts to aggressively clear a path through enemy ground.

abilities.name: Flashpoint
abilities.description: Equip a blinding charge that can be fired from walls to flash enemies.

abilities.name: Fault Line
abilities.description: Equip a seismic blast that dazes enemies in a zone in front of Breach.

abilities.name: Aftershock
abilities.description: Equip a fusion charge that can be fired to set off a slow-acting burst through a wall.

abilities.name: Rolling Thunder
abilities.description: Equip a seismic charge that sends a quake cascading through terrain in a large cone.

name: Astra
description: Ghanaian Agent Astra harnesses the energies of the cosmos to reshape battlefields to her whim.

abilities.name: Nova Pulse
abilities.description: Place stars in Astral Form, then activate to detonate, concussing all players in the area.

abilities.name: Nebula
abilities.description: Place stars in Astral Form, then activate to transform it into a smoke that blocks vision.

abilities.name: Gravity Well
abilities.description: Place stars in Astral Form, then activate to form a gravity well that pulls players toward its center.

abilities.name: Astral Form / Cosmic Divide
abilities.description: Enter Astral Form to place stars, then activate Cosmic Divide to create a wall that blocks bullets.
